title: Urban Jungle
description: A photographic series capturing the intersection of nature and brutalist architecture in modern megacities. Highlighting the resilience of organic life in concrete environments.

title: Abstract Flow
description: A generative art study using fluid dynamics algorithms to create unique, one-of-a-kind visual patterns that mimic water and air currents.

title: Retro Future
description: A branding identity for a synthwave music festival. The visual language draws heavy inspiration from 80s arcade games and VHS typography.

title: Minimalist
description: A UI/UX case study for a meditation app focused on extreme simplicity and negative space. The goal was to reduce cognitive load to zero.

title: Cyber Punk
description: A 3D character design project for an upcoming indie game. Focusing on non-traditional humanoid forms and bioluminescent textures.
